page.title: 06Clubs(3) - Guides
page.content:
{Clubs}-{Guides}by Antonia Payne. ______________ The Guides from Pytchley must join with groups from Orlingbury or Kettering.My{group}meets at Orlingbury Village hall on Tuesdays at 7.30.p.m. Our leader is Mrs. Cook. When we are ready we put up our hands and are quiet. We go to our corners and line up, collect our subs and give it in. We then form a horseshoe, sing the song and then play a game. We then learn about the badge we are trying to get. In the winter, the older girls make hot drinks for us to buy.
At the end of the{meeting,}we gather in a circle, sing the leaving song and are then dismissed.
We go home at about a quarter to nine.
